name.ja: <ruby>転<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>惺<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>げ</rt></ruby>－<ruby>闇<rt>あん</rt></ruby><ruby>巴<rt>ば</rt></ruby>

text.en: You can Tribute 1 "Ryu-Ge" monster from your hand or field, except "Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva"; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If this card is destroyed: You can place 1 "Ryu-Ge" Continuous Spell/Trap from your Deck, GY, or banishment face-up on your field. You can only use each monster effect of "Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva" once per turn.

pendulum_effect.en: You cannot Pendulum Summon, except "Ryu-Ge" monsters (this effect cannot be negated). When a card or effect activated by your opponent in response to your "Ryu-Ge" Spell Card or effect activation resolves, you can negate that effect, then destroy this card. You can only use this effect of "Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva" once per turn.
